killer_builds.name: Build: Pressure
killer_builds.description: All chosen perks must be centered around the terror radius.

killer_builds.name: Build: Hexed
killer_builds.description: All chosen perks must be Hexes.

killer_builds.name: Build: Semi-Random III
killer_builds.description: You may choose 3 perks yourself- the last must be random.

killer_builds.name: Build: Semi-Random I
killer_builds.description: You may choose 1 perk yourself- the rest must be random.

killer_builds.name: Build: Custom
killer_builds.description: You may choose your perks this round.

killer_builds.name: Build: Semi-Random II
killer_builds.description: You may choose 2 perks yourself- the rest must be random.

killer_builds.name: Build: Bleed 'em
killer_builds.description: All chosen perks must be anti-healing.

killer_builds.name: Build: Obsessed
killer_builds.description: All chosen perks must be centered around the obsession.

killer_builds.name: Build: Gen Buster
killer_builds.description: All chosen perks must be centered around gen regression.

killer_builds.name: Build: Just like the Simulations
killer_builds.description: Use the build you currently have equipped in pubs.

killer_builds.name: Build: All-Seeing
killer_builds.description: All chosen perks must be centered around aura reading.

killer_builds.name: Build: Clutch
killer_builds.description: All chosen perks must be centered around the endgame.

killer_builds.name: Build: Devoted
killer_builds.description: All chosen perks must call upon the Entity to do something (e.g. block gens).

survivor_builds.name: Build: Semi-Random III
survivor_builds.description: You may choose 3 perks yourself- the last must be random.

survivor_builds.name: Build: Runner
survivor_builds.description: All chosen perks must be built around taking chase.

survivor_builds.name: Build: Wallhacks
survivor_builds.description: All chosen perks must be built around aura reading.

survivor_builds.name: Build: Exhausted
survivor_builds.description: All chosen perks must be exhaustion perks.

survivor_builds.name: Build: Stealthy
survivor_builds.description: All chosen perks must make the player more stealthy.

survivor_builds.name: Build: Just like the Simulations
survivor_builds.description: Use the build you currently have equipped in pubs.

survivor_builds.name: Build: Medic
survivor_builds.description: All chosen perks must be focused on healing.

survivor_builds.description: You may choose 1 perk yourself- the rest must be random.

killer_sabo_cards.name: Forced Amnesia
killer_sabo_cards.description: Reduce the number of perks a survivor can bring by 1.

killer_sabo_cards.name: Forgotten Augments
killer_sabo_cards.description: Limit a survivor's add-ons to yellow and brown add-ons.

killer_sabo_cards.name: Flesh Wound
killer_sabo_cards.description: Ban a survivor from using a perk of your choosing.

killer_sabo_cards.name: Broken Tools
killer_sabo_cards.description: Ban a survivor from using an item of your choosing.

killer_sabo_cards.name: Chained Pallets
killer_sabo_cards.description: Ban a survivor from dropping pallets.

killer_sabo_cards.name: Spiked Windows
killer_sabo_cards.description: Ban a survivor from vaulting windows.

killer_sabo_cards.name: Splintered Pallets
killer_sabo_cards.description: Ban a survivor from vaulting pallets.

killer_sabo_cards.name: Hallowed Property
killer_sabo_cards.description: Ban a survivor from entering main building - if the map has a main building.

killer_sabo_cards.name: Locked Shack
killer_sabo_cards.description: Ban a survivor from entering killer shack - if the map has a killer shack.

killer_sabo_cards.name: Swift Avoidance
killer_sabo_cards.description: Avoid a killer sabotage card effect.

killer_sabo_cards.name: Forced Adaptation
killer_sabo_cards.description: Force a survivor to redraw their build card.

survivor_sabo_cards.name: Decisive Removal
survivor_sabo_cards.description: Reduce the amount of perks the killer can use this game.

survivor_sabo_cards.name: Foresight
survivor_sabo_cards.description: Limit killer's add-ons to yellow and brown add-ons.

survivor_sabo_cards.name: Prophetic Knowledge
survivor_sabo_cards.description: Force the killer player to play a killer of your choice.

survivor_sabo_cards.name: Bloody Ward
survivor_sabo_cards.description: Ban the killer player from playing a killer of your choice.

survivor_sabo_cards.name: Titanium Pallets
survivor_sabo_cards.description: The killer cannot break pallets next game (cancels with Provocative Pallets).

survivor_sabo_cards.name: Provocative Pallets
survivor_sabo_cards.description: While in chase the killer must break every pallet dropped as soon at is dropped (cancels with Titanium Pallets).

survivor_sabo_cards.name: Rebuild
survivor_sabo_cards.description: Force the killer player to draw another build card.

survivor_sabo_cards.name: Boon: Sanctuary Shack
survivor_sabo_cards.description: The killer cannot harm you while you are within the killer shack - if the map has a killer shack.

survivor_sabo_cards.name: Boon: Sanctuary Structure
survivor_sabo_cards.description: The killer cannot harm you while you are within the main building - if the map has a main building (indoor maps like The Game do not count).

survivor_sabo_cards.name: Circle of Salt
survivor_sabo_cards.description: Avoid the sabotage effect played by the Killer.
